articles.title: world's best disease
articles.body: if you get this disease, good things happen...Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet doner capicola jowl, frankfurter bacon leberkas swine sausage venison spare ribs shoulder corned beef. Jerky sirloin bacon, filet mignon tongue salami capicola pig strip steak hamburger tri-tip. Pig sirloin chuck tenderloin, tongue kielbasa corned beef pancetta hamburger andouille pork loin. Ham venison meatloaf, jowl ribeye pork chop cow. T-bone turkey corned beef short ribs jerky pork belly pancetta pork loin tongue hamburger turducken filet mignon. Pork belly jerky salami shankle kevin cow beef ribs. Boudin corned beef bresaola prosciutto.
